Category: Facial Cleanser

danea), Lemongrass oil (Cymbopogon Flexuosus), Rosemary Oil (Rosmarinus Officinalis), Sage Oil (Salvia officinalis), Tea Tree Oil (Melaleuca alternifolia), Thyme Oil (Thymus Zygis), Benzoin Resinoid (Styrax Tonkinensis Pierre), Hand Harvested Sea Salt, *Citral, *Limonene

Directions: Melt between the fingers before massaging over the skin or simply
book: 1446-Lush Naked Cleansing Balm, Tea Totaler (2019 formulation)

r the skin or simply glide the bar over the face, then wipe away with a damp face cloth.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity; LOW: Cancer, Use Restrictions
